author-notes.corresp: Address correspondence to Li Wang, capricornkey@163.com, or Bin Hong, binhong69@hotmail.com.

fn.p: Xingxing Li and Wei He contributed equally to this work. Author order was determined consensually by the authors.

Citation Li X, He W, Sun H, Shi Y, Zhang X, Xie Y, Wang L, Hong B. 2020. Draft genome sequence of Streptomyces sp. strain I05A-00742, isolated in Shangri-La, China. Microbiol Resour Announc 9:e00521-20. https://doi.org/10.1128/MRA.00521-20.
